June 5, 1937 D Penybontfawr Contest (Class A)
Penybontfawr Contest (Class A) 0 Test Piece Contest
penybontfawr-contest-class-a
None
Recollections of Wales
Penybontfawr, Powys, Wales, UK March contest(own choice) - 1st Gresford Colliery, 2nd Oswestry Excelsior. Promoted by Penybontfawr Agricultural Society. Prizes - 1st £15 and rose bowl, 2nd £8, 3rd £4, 4th £2. 4 bands competed.
Nov. 15, 2013, 5:22 p.m. Jan. 17, 2019, 11:29 a.m.
1 Wrexham Brass Charles Bennett
2 Sankey's Castle Works Cyril Yorath
3 Llay Welfare Charles Sharley
4 Oswestry Excelsior Silver Prize James Hager
